basics.name: Maximiliano Hernandez Castillo
basics.label: Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer from Monterrey, Mexico, with over 3 years of expertise in web development. Proficient in Python and JavaScript with a strong ability to transform business requirements into effective software solutions. Extensive experience with Linux systems and hands-on knowledge of graphical user interface design and development.

work.summary:
- Focused on front-end development for e-commerce websites, collaborating with cross-functional teams using **Agile methodologies (Scrum)**.
- Refined front-end expertise by mastering tools like **TypeScript** and adopting industry best practices such as **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** and **SOLID principles**.
- Contributed to high-quality codebases through adherence to clean coding standards and collaborative problem-solving with highly skilled professionals.
- Gained hands-on experience in building scalable, user-friendly interfaces that align with business goals and customer needs.
